machines.title: Machines
machines.tooltip_short_domain: Users of your tailnet can use this DNS short name to access this machine.
machines.tooltip_full_domain: Users of your tailnet can use this DNS name to access this machine.

users.title: Users
users.delete_has_machines: Users cannot be deleted if they have machines. Please delete or re-assign their machines to other users before proceeding.

manage_banner.oidc_suffix: . Groups and user information do not automatically sync.
manage_banner.not_managed: Users are not managed externally. Using OpenID Connect can create a better experience when using Headscale.
